argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The file name, including drive and path.

argument.name: file_open_mode
argument.description: The Open Mode system variables are:

page.discussion: The FILE.CREATE() method creates and opens a new file, returning a object pointer reference to the file. Note : When you delete , Alpha Anywhere closes the file.

section.description: Ask user to type a new filename.
section.example: filename = ui_get_file("Create a file","Text Files (*.txt)", "c:\a5\defaults.txt","N") if (filename = "") then end end if

section.description: Write first line of data to the file.
section.example: for i = 1 TO 5 file_pointer.write("A5_" + ltrim( str(i) ) ) next i 'New line file_pointer.write_line("") 'Write another line of data for i = 1 TO 5 file_pointer.write("VAR" + ltrim( str(i) ) ) next i file_pointer.flush() file_pointer.close()
